amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds to be used for the Environmental Protection Agency's Criminal Enforcement Division.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 76 printed in House Report 114-683 to ensure that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Environmental Protection Agency's Criminal Enforcement Division.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 223 (Roll no. 453).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 223 (Roll no. 453).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Palmer.
